message_thread.content:
1. Based on the extracted data from {'Course Information': {'Course Title': 'Creating Stunning Digital Graphics with Canva', 'Name of Organisation': 'INNOHAT TRAINING PTE. LTD.', 'Classroom Hours': 22, 'Number of Assessment Hours': 2, 'Course Duration (Number of Hours)': 16, 'Industry': 'Design'}, 'Learning Outcomes': {'Learning Outcomes': ['LO1: Develop visual communication projects in Canva, blending typography with media elements.', 'LO2: Create Canva storyboards to communicate visual intention to team members and evaluate designs to suggest visual enhancements.', 'LO3: Develop strategies for Canva designs, critiquing and collaborating to improve visual communication based on best practices.'], 'Knowledge': ['K1: Elements of typography, logos, other visual communication design, and information design', 'K2: Best practices in visual communication', 'K3: Uses of relevant design software packages', 'K4: Colour fundamentals and forms', 'K5: Techniques for analysing aesthetics'], 'Ability': ['A1: Initiate visual communication ideas through exploration', 'A2: Develop visual communication outputs by integrating media, materials, processes and environment', 'A3: Create storyboards and task flow designs to communicate visual intentions to team members', 'A4: Evaluate the design work of stakeholders', 'A5: Propose suggestions to enhance the visual formats of designs', 'A6: Critique own work or work with others to enhance visual communication outputs', 'A7: Develop strategies to enhance the appeal of visual communication outputs'], 'Knowledge and Ability Mapping': {'KA1': ['A1', 'K1', 'K3', 'A2', 'K4'], 'KA2': ['A3', 'K5', 'A4', 'A5'], 'KA3': ['A6', 'K2', 'A7']}}, 'TSC and Topics': {'TSC Title': ['Visual Communication'], 'TSC Code': ['DSN-COM-4005-1.1'], 'Topics': ['Topic 1: Introduction to Canva and Basic Design Principles (A1, K1, K3)', 'Topic 2: Colour and Form in Canva Design (A2, K4)', 'Topic 3: Storyboarding and Flow Design in Canva (A3, K5)', 'Topic 4: Best Practices and Aesthetic Analysis in Canva (A4, A5)', 'Topic 5: Critical Review and Enhancement Strategies in Canva (A6, K2)', 'Topic 6: Innovative Approaches to Design in Canva (A7, K2)'], 'Learning Units': ['LU1: Introduction to Canva Design', 'LU2: Storyboarding and Flow Design', 'LU3: Enhancing Visual Communication']}, 'Assessment Methods': {'Assessment Methods': ['Written Assessment', 'Practical Performance'], 'Amount of Practice Hours': 'N.A.', 'Course Outline': {'Learning Units': {'LU1': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 1: Introduction to Canva and Basic Design Principles (A1, K1, K3)', 'Details': ["Navigating Canva's interface and features", 'Principles of typography and logo design', 'Basics of visual communication design', 'Creating simple designs and layouts', "Experimenting with Canva's text and image tools"]}, {'Topic': 'Topic 2: Colour and Form in Canva Design (A2, K4)', 'Details': ['Fundamentals of colour theory and application', 'Exploring colour schemes and palettes in Canva', 'The role of forms and shapes in design', 'Practical exercises on colour and form harmonization', 'Designing for different environments and contexts']}]}, 'LU2': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 3: Storyboarding and Flow Design in Canva (A3, K5)', 'Details': ['Techniques for creating effective storyboards', 'Developing task flows for visual projects', 'Utilizing Canva for ideation and conceptualization', 'Case Study of effective storyboard designs', 'Hands-on exercises in storyboard creation']}, {'Topic': 'Topic 4: Best Practices and Aesthetic Analysis in Canva (A4, A5)', 'Details': ['Understanding and applying design best practices', 'Techniques for aesthetic and functional analysis', 'Critiquing and improving Canva projects', 'Workshop on designing with user experience in mind', 'Group activities for peer review and feedback']}]}, 'LU3': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 5: Critical Review and Enhancement Strategies in Canva (A6, K2)', 'Details': ['Methods for critiquing visual designs', 'Strategies for effective visual communication', 'Workshops on enhancing existing Canva designs', 'Collaborative exercises for peer-to-peer learning', 'Techniques for iterative design improvements']}, {'Topic': 'Topic 6: Innovative Approaches to Design in Canva (A7, K2)', 'Details': ['Developing innovative design strategies', 'Exploring advanced features and tools in Canva', 'Case Study of successful visual communication', 'Group projects for practical application', 'Presentations on innovative design solutions']}]}}}, 'Instructional Methods': ['Lecture', 'Didactic Questioning', 'Demonstration', 'Practical']}}, generate your justifications.
    2. Ensure your responses are structured in JSON format.
    3. Return a full JSON object with all your answers according to the schema.
